page.title: 18RELIGION - SAPPERTON
page.content: Sapperton: Church of England Church of St. Nicholas in the Ropsley Group of Parishes. Rector Rev. Basil Foster, Lay Reader;Kenneth Mann. Churchwardens: Maj.Gen.Sir Christopher Welby-Everard, George A Rimington. Services: Holy Communion alternate Sundays. Average congregation 7 or 8; occasional Group Morning Service held. At the annual Harvest Festival approx 50 may attend. At the Christmas Carol Service, with choristers from St. Wulfram's Grantham, the church is full to capacity. The building of Norman Transitional style dating originally from the 13th century is in a good state of repair since new coping stones were fitted this year. Recent acquisitions from the redundant church at Haceby were the Rood Beam, Lectern, Oak chest and Alter Cross.
